column1: #Text=The paper and some of its columnists warned against electing  a man who is a racist, a boor, a sexist.
#Text=A fraud, who has stiffed thousands of contractors for money and hasn't paid income taxes for decades.
#Text=A bully who has talked about using nuclear weapons.So he won the election.
#Text=That doesn't change his moral and character shortcomings.The Globe made the right call.
#Text=People who think this sleazy salesman is going to bring back America of the 1960s are in for a big surprise.
#Text=As the saying goes: you can't go back.
